May 25, 1967
Mrs. Marjorie Newman
Program Director, WFSU-FM
University Broadcasting Services
The Florida State University
Tallahassee, Florida 32306
Dear Mrs. Newman:
Thank you for your letter of May 23, 1967, regarding the
legislation proposing the Public Broadcasting Act of 1967.
I appreciate very much your taking the time once again to
relate to me your views on this most important matter. It
is always helpful to have the benefit of the thinking of
those who are directly concerned with such matters.
You can be assured I will very carefully study and consider
this bill when it is brought before the House for considera¬
tion.
S
Don Fuqua, M. C*
